Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our pricing

We offer four comprehensive plans: Starter ($250/month) for small businesses with 50K records, Essential ($500/month) with unlimited records and advanced analytics, Expert ($1200/month) with dedicated support and premium features, and Customized Plan tailored to your specific requirements with flexible pricing.

Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial for all new accounts. No credit card required to start your trial. You can explore our platform, access sample data, and experience all features before making a commitment.

Each plan includes a specific number of points for downloading trade data and contact information. Starter plan includes 360,000 points for trade data and 5,000 points for contacts. Essential offers 1,080,000 trade data points and 10,000 contact points. Expert plan provides 2,400,000 trade data points and 30,000 contact points. Points can be used to download shipment records and company contact details throughout your subscription period.

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), debit cards, PayPal, bank transfers, and wire transfers. For annual subscriptions, we also offer invoice-based payments for corporate clients. All transactions are secured with industry-standard encryption.

Monthly plans are billed on the same date each month. Annual plans offer 20% savings and are billed once per year. Payment is due at the start of each billing cycle. Enterprise and Customized plans may have flexible payment terms negotiated with our sales team. All subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled before the renewal date.

For a Customized Plan tailored to your specific needs, you can schedule a demo through our website, contact our sales team at sales@vietnamtradedata.com, or call us directly. Our team will work with you to understand your data requirements, usage patterns, and budget to create a personalized solution that perfectly fits your business needs.
